version_description: * Sorry, the last update didn't fix a crash when viewing trade agreements with other civilizations, this time we got it right.
* Sorry, the last update didn't fix a crash when viewing trade agreements with other civilizations, this time we got it right.

This update makes it much easier to configure connection to your server thanks to the new QR code connection feature. Just install a server package, activate Remote plugin, and scan the displayed QR code with the app to connect to your server. Also, on Windows, the server will now automatically configure firewall to allow connections if required. The manual connection configuration screen has also been updated to make it more clear and easy to use.

This update makes it much easier to configure connection to your server thanks to the new QR code connection feature. Just install a server package, activate Remote plugin, and scan the displayed QR code with the app to connect to your server. Also, on Windows, the server will now automatically configure firewall to allow connections if required. The manual connection configuration screen has also been updated to make it more clear and easy to use.

* Fixed a crash in certain situations when using QR code connection feature
* Performance skills are included when viewing unit skills

* Fixed a crash in certain situations when using QR code connection feature
* Performance skills are included when viewing unit skills

Several nasty bugs have been fixed in this version:

* A crash when pressing Close button right after changing activity zone settings
* A crash when disconnecting from a server in certain situations
* A crash when rapidly switching between tabs on unit list screen
* An issue with unavailable jobs not being properly shown in red colour when adding jobs to a workshop/furnace

Several nasty bugs have been fixed in this version:

* A crash when pressing Close button right after changing activity zone settings
* A crash when disconnecting from a server in certain situations
* A crash when rapidly switching between tabs on unit list screen
* An issue with unavailable jobs not being properly shown in red colour when adding jobs to a workshop/furnace

* Fixed a crash in certain situations when using QR code connection feature
* Fixed possible crash when using search function in build menu

* Fixed a crash in certain situations when using QR code connection feature
* Fixed possible crash when using search function in build menu

* Keyboard uses dark style on dark in-game screens
* Hopefully fixed a crash when stopping screen recording on iPad
* Number of items required/left when placing a construction (walls, floor, etc.) is indicated
* You can access instrument and dance/poetic/musical form descriptions from unit skills screen
* You can now toggle high priority ("Do task now!") status for jobs in workshops
* When assigning owner for a building, candidates are shown with their profession colours

* Keyboard uses dark style on dark in-game screens
* Hopefully fixed a crash when stopping screen recording on iPad
* Number of items required/left when placing a construction (walls, floor, etc.) is indicated
* You can access instrument and dance/poetic/musical form descriptions from unit skills screen
* You can now toggle high priority ("Do task now!") status for jobs in workshops
* When assigning owner for a building, candidates are shown with their profession colours
This update brings support for Dwarf Fortress 0.43.05
This update brings support for Dwarf Fortress 0.43.05
This update contains internal changes to help us to diagnose server communication issues.
This update contains internal changes to help us to diagnose server communication issues.

This update contains number of internal improvements, adds search function to labors screens, and fixes for the following issues:

* Zoom to/view buttons were not working for activity zones on Rooms & Buildings screen.
* Traffic costs could not be changed after reconnecting to a game.
* "Trader profit is more than 1000" warning was shown even if broker had no appraisal skill.

This update contains number of internal improvements, adds search function to labors screens, and fixes for the following issues:

* Zoom to/view buttons were not working for activity zones on Rooms & Buildings screen.
* Traffic costs could not be changed after reconnecting to a game.
* "Trader profit is more than 1000" warning was shown even if broker had no appraisal skill.
Bug fixes, including squad attack in region command.
Bug fixes, including squad attack in region command.
Fixing bugs and ensuring compatibility with iOS 11.
Fixing bugs and ensuring compatibility with iOS 11.

This version adds support for configuring conditions for manager orders.

Also, when searching for job types to create a new manager order, individual words will be matched instead of whole strings. This means you can type "smelt platinum" or even just "sme p" to find "smelt native platinum ore" job.

This version adds support for configuring conditions for manager orders.

Also, when searching for job types to create a new manager order, individual words will be matched instead of whole strings. This means you can type "smelt platinum" or even just "sme p" to find "smelt native platinum ore" job.
This version contains some network-related and user interface fixes.
This version contains some network-related and user interface fixes.

Introducing Server Subscription

Server Subscription is the best option to start playing Dwarf Fortress on a mobile device - no need to set up and maintain your own server, or worry about your home network connection being compatible with Remote. You can upload existing game saves, and download them at any time to continue playing on your own server or in the original Dwarf Fortress on desktop. Dwarf Fortress is a game by Bay 12 Games, available for free from bay12games.com/dwarves.

This release also improves compatibility with iOS 12 and new iPhone models, and fixes an occasional crash on the unit list screen.

This version fixes several issues discovered during the launch of the Server Subscription service.

Introducing Server Subscription

You can upload existing game saves, and download them at any time to continue playing on your own server or in the original Dwarf Fortress on desktop. This version contains some tweaks and improvements to the main menu:

* Pressing and holding Announcements button will open announcements/reports screen and switch to Reports tab straight away.
* Announcements button will be highlighted if there are any new combat/hunting/sparring reports, and Petitions button will be highlighted if there are any new petitions requiring attention.
* For Server Subscription users, a button is added to save a snapshot of the game map to the 3D gallery.

This version improves tileset and color scheme selection screen in preparation for the upcoming DF 0.44.12 support, and fixes appearance of text fields on some screens.

This version contains changes required for the upcoming support for DF 0.44.12.

Info/help buttons have been added to items on workshop add job screen, opening a description of the corresponding job or product. Also, the in-app help viewer now preserves navigation history when you close it and open again.

This version contains changes required for the upcoming support for DF 0.44.12.

Info/help buttons have been added to items on workshop add job screen, opening a description of the corresponding job or product. Also, the in-app help viewer now preserves navigation history when you close it and open again.
This update fixes several application crashes, including the one when switching seasonal fertilization for a farm plot, and the one when attaching images in the support chat.
This update fixes several application crashes, including the one when switching seasonal fertilization for a farm plot, and the one when attaching images in the support chat.

This update makes it possible to configure number of announcement lines shown and announcement scroll speed. Also the following issues are fixed:

* Application crash when trying to change siege engine settings.
* Game is not automatically paused on iPad when navigating away from the map view.

This update makes it possible to configure number of announcement lines shown and announcement scroll speed. Also the following issues are fixed:

* Application crash when trying to change siege engine settings.
* Game is not automatically paused on iPad when navigating away from the map view.
